attributes.action: Extend the current Help to Buy scheme in England
attributes.additional_details:
The current Help to Buy scheme requires new builds to be built by the 31st December 2020 with legal completion by 31st March 2021. 

With delays caused by COVID-19, it now means for many new build buyers there completion date has been delayed by a number of months, which takes them past the existing help to by deadline date.

By extending the legal completion date by 6 months it will mean those who were able to use Help to Buy before lockdown can continue to do so.
attributes.background: Extend the current Help to Buy scheme in England by 6 months for those who have already exchanged contracts on there New Build Property.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331592
